main event: Multiple witnesses reported a large, high-speed, and evasive flying object over Greensboro, NC on September 12, 1952. The object was described as roughly round, greenish in color, and exhibited erratic zig-zag maneuvers. Reports came from individuals with aviation experience, adding credibility to the sightings.
interesting points: Multiple credible witnesses, including individuals with aviation experience, reported the sighting.
The object was described as a large, roughly round, greenish object with evasive zig-zag motion.
One witness estimated the object to be about a mile and a half away and 12 to 15 feet in diameter.
The sighting lasted 2-3 minutes, and the object exhibited high-speed maneuvering, with no sound reported by the witnesses.
Newspapers reported a similar sighting, describing the object as a huge ball with a tail, potentially a meteor.
sighted object: large, high-speed, roughly round, greenish object with erratic zig-zag maneuvers
witnesses: Multiple credible witnesses including individuals with aviation experience
